Articles.Content:
I accidently bumped a button, and somehow, these odd red and yellow flight markings have popped up on the screen, and align with the runway. I tried pressing every button to shut it off, but somehow, these markings are still there. I Don't know if this is part of a mod or not. I thought I removed all mods to get rid of it, but these markings still show up.

I don't think they hinder me, but these markings are really getting annoying. So, how do I shut these markings off?
This is something one of your mods is doing.
It's one of your mods. Go to your GameData and look for anything that says HUD. Might have to look inside of mods as I know one mod adds it as a subfeature.

On 9/16/2016 at 3:21 PM, Vanamonde said:

This is something one of your mods is doing. 

 

On 9/16/2016 at 3:38 PM, ZooNamedGames said:

It's one of your mods. Go to your GameData and look for anything that says HUD. Might have to look inside of mods as I know one mod adds it as a subfeature.

Thanks, guys.

Ended up realizing it was the Kerbal Konstructs mod giving me trouble. Found it out when I finally saw the marker asset in a file search.
